minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I know you're all concerned about the long hours I've been putting in...

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: Can you take a break this weekend?. The uncertainty is hard on all of us. Do you have a backup plan?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The stress is temporary. Once we close this funding, things will stabilize.

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: What about our savings?. I'm worried about the stress you're under. Can you at least take Sundays off?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I'm trying to balance everything, but the investor meetings are crucial right now.

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: You're working 16-hour days. You've been working 80-hour weeks for months. This is affecting your health and our relationship.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The stress is temporary. Once we close this funding, things will stabilize.

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: What about our savings?. I'm worried about the stress you're under. Can you at least take Sundays off?

action_items.task: Set boundaries for work hours and family time
